Protecting Smite.name: Protecting Smite
Protecting Smite.flavor: A decisive strike against your enemy gives your allies a chance to see to their own defense.
Protecting Smite.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Rampart of Strength.name: Rampart of Strength
Rampart of Strength.flavor: You raise your shield, and from it bursts scintillating astral radiance that drives back your foes.
Rampart of Strength.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Rampart of Strength.onHit: 3d8 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Rampart of Strength.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Rampart of Strength.effect: Until the end of the encounter, at the start of each of your turns, if you have not moved since the start of your last turn, you can use a free action to grant yourself and each ally adjacent to you a +4 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Constant Shield.name: Constant Shield
Constant Shield.flavor: You channel divine might through your shield to defend yourself and your charges.
Constant Shield.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Constant Shield.effect: Until the stance ends, you and any allies adjacent to you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex. In addition, when you or any ally adjacent to you is pulled, pushed, or slid, you can reduce the forced movement by 1 square.
